message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase my product. I believe it would be incredibly beneficial for you.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $13,000.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. What do you think?
Bob, thanks for the offer.  I understand your perspective, but $9,000 is quite a bit lower than I'm comfortable with.  How about we meet closer to the middle at $11,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $10,500. I'm willing to meet you in the middle again, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $10,250. What do you think?
